page.title: 03THE BEACH.
page.content: Although this beach area has become remarkably popular for holidaymakers during the summer months, behind Pensarn's superficial thriving holiday resort image there is an underlying problem with the beach _ pollution. Due to several sewerage outlets along the whole of the North Wales coast, and a more local problem of rubbish dumped on the Llanddulas beach Pensarn has attained an unwanted reputation as a pollution blackspot. The nearby dual carriageway and railway track only make things worse; fortunately, something is now being done to control the problem of pollution.
